Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-Substance-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance|5.0.0 to Substanceversion: 4.0.1)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Substance.meta (meta)is equivalent toElement `Substance.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.implicitRules (implicitRules)is equivalent toElement `Substance.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.language (language)is equivalent toElement `Substance.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.language`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.text (text)is equivalent toElement `Substance.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.text`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.contained (contained)is equivalent toElement `Substance.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.identifier (identifier)is equivalent toElement `Substance.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.instance (instance)is equivalent toElement `Substance.instance` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.status (status)is equivalent toNote that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Substance.status`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifact-status`. Element `Substance.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.status`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.category (category)is equivalent toElement `Substance.category` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.category`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.code (code)maps to wider conceptElement `Substance.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.code`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.description (description)is equivalent toElement `Substance.description` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.description`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.expiry (expiry)is equivalent toElement `Substance.expiry` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance.expiry`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.quantity (quantity)is equivalent toElement `Substance.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance.quantity`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.ingredient (ingredient)maps to wider conceptElement `Substance.ingredient` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.ingredient.quantity (quantity)is equivalent toElement `Substance.ingredient.quantity` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.ingredient.substance[x] (substance[x])is equivalent toElement `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`. Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.

Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`, but has no comparisons.
Substance.ingredient.substance[x] (substance[x])is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Substance.ingredient.substanceElement `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`. Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.

name: R5SubstanceElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Substance to FHIR R4 Substance
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Substance to FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Substance.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.instance` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Substance.status`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifact-status`.
Element `Substance.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.status`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
